available_functions.name: list_attractions
available_functions.description: List top attractions for the given city. Returns an array of attraction objects (name, address, shortDescription, rating, category).

city.description: City name or query (e.g., 'Paris, France' or 'Seattle, WA').

limit.description: Maximum number of attractions to return.

available_functions.name: search_flight
available_functions.description: Search for round-trip flights for the given dates and number of passengers. Returns an array of flight objects (airline, flightNumber, departureDateTime, arrivalDateTime, duration, stops, price {amount, currency}, bookingUrl). Dates should be ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

available_functions.name: search_web
available_functions.description: Search the web for the given query. Returns an array of result strings (title + URL).

available_functions.name: list_events
available_functions.description: List events in a city between startDate and endDate that may affect travel planning (e.g., strikes, bank holidays, festivals, carnivals). Returns an array of event objects: { id, name, type, description, startDateTime (ISO 8601), endDateTime (ISO 8601), allDay (boolean), location, timezone, impact (low|medium|high), isPublicHoliday (boolean), sourceUrl }.

city.description: City name or query (e.g., 'Paris, France' or 'Seattle, WA').

startDate.description: Start of the date range (inclusive) in YYYY-MM-DD (ISO 8601).

endDate.description: End of the date range (inclusive) in YYYY-MM-DD (ISO 8601).
